RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 870 Y Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 23700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JORNALERO stalked pace, rallied 4wide turn, dueled stretch, proved best. DASH PAST THEM hustled along, vied inside throughout, outfinished, gamely. KOOL KUE BLUE stalked inside, awaited room turn, bid between, not enough. CHICKS IN THE MEADOW vied 2across to turn, fell back, evenly late. LIFES A DANNCE outside trip, lacked a bid, outrun. REAL ME raced inside, even effort, outrun.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOTA DAZZLING EAGLE bumped start, strong finish. A WARRIOR INSIDE came out early, closed. TIPPA THE ICEBERG clean trip, clear path. EASY WINNER reluctant to load, led, hung late. JESS M BEAUTIFUL bumped start. MOONIN A CORONA veered in start. HOLLIS G no mishap. NEXT VALERIA broke out, pushed out. JS REAL PASSION pushed out, lacked a bid.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 3 550 Y Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 39200. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZERO ZERO SIETE clear early, held. EBW SOLIDASAROCK in tight early, chased. RZ RICHY in close, steady bid. LUNAS FLASHY JOLLA broke slowly, crowded, steady close. FLASH ME THE PRICE in close, not enough. BOAZ THE OVERCOMER came in start. GRS STREAKER DADDY ducked out start. A SIMPLE SENDOFF in tight early, crowded. RONAS RYON HEARTS in tight early, crowded.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 47. Maiden Special Weight Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARKED UP set a pressured pace to the turn, drew off for a clear lead and was ridden out. HOLY BULLET pressed the pace along the inside, angled out on the turn, bid, hung and was no match for the winner. NOT TO FANCY saved ground to the stretch, shifted out, lacked a late response and settled for show. ATTILA'S ACE got away well, showed speed to the turn and gave way. SHUG'S ROCKET raced outside, pressed the pace to the turn and stopped. PHANTOM RAIN came in at the start, fell far back early, trailed the field and was not urged in the stretch. SWAYINGTOTHEMUSIC refused. The stewards' posted an inquiry concerning the start. No change was made.

ENTRY.NAME: Not to Fancy
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to stretch, shifted out, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Bullet
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, angled out turn, bid,hung, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Phantom Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in start, far back early, trailed, not urged stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Attila's Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, speed to turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Marked Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, drew off turn, clear lead, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Shug's Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced outside, pressed pace, fell back into turn, stopped,

RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOORAY AUSTIN outside, swung wide leaving turn, closed, up late, going away. FREEDOM FLASH angled in top of stretch, closed willingly, dueled late,outclosed. HEZA CLASSY NOW vied to final strides, outclosed, all out for show. HI HIGH HOPES bumped, squeezed start, vied to final strides, game effort. AXEL STEEL broke slowly, in the back, finished well, not enough. DANNYBOB broke out, bumped, saved ground to stretch, lacked a rally. BOJANGLES COMIN bumped start, vied to turn, dropped back, gave way. NOREASON FORDIAMONDS broke awkwardly, trailed, no response.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOR HORSES WHICH HAVE NOT RUN FIRST, SECOND OR THIRD AT THE RUIDOSO 2023 MEET. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED HOT CAT stalked the pace along the inside while boxed in, angled out on the turn, bid willingly and inched away late to prove best. GOLDEN BAND pressed the pace, challenged between horses on the turn, dueled through the stretch and was outfinished in a game effort. FLAT FAST saved ground to the turn, angled out and finished well to get up at the wire for show. JAZZ MAN DO raced close to the pace towards the outside, challenged three across on the turn, dueled to late stretch, hung late and was caught for third. TYGER TENNESSEE lagged early, swung wide leaving the turn and lacked a bid. BONFIRE PARTY set a pressured pace to the turn and gave way. LAS TRES MARIPOSAS stalked the pace to the turn and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Flat Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to turn, angled out, finished well, up wire for show

ENTRY.NAME: Bonfire Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace to turn, dropped back, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, angled out turn, steady close, inched way late

ENTRY.NAME: Tyger Tennessee
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged early, swung wide leaving turn, lacked a bid

ENTRY.NAME: Jazz Man Do
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close outside, challenged 3across turn, dueled, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Band
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, challenged between turn, dueled stretch, gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 7 330 Y Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 19000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, AND FIVE YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOOKIN FOR CARTEL in tight start, steady bid, all out. DADDYS IRISH FLING dueled throughout, outnodded, just missed. CHATADADDY dueled throughout, game effort. GOTTA POP EAGLE in tight start, steady bid. UNUSUAL N RARE bobbled, broke out, bumped. M S THEGREATPERICLES broke in. DASHING BETTE bumped start. VY BONITA LUNA bumped, pushed in start.

ENTRY.NAME: Lookin for Cartel
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, steady bid, all out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOR HORSES WHICH HAVE NOT RUN FIRST, SECOND OR THIRD AT THE RUIDOSO 2023 MEET. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COWBOY TOBY broke in and bumped at the start, stalked the pace, rallied four wide on the turn, dueled for the lead and inched clear late. SIGALERT set the pace, responded when challenged to duel and yielded late to finish second best. MAJORWAYHOME pressed the pace along the inside, bid between horses entering the stretch and lacked the needed late response. SHANE ZAIN broke out and bumped at the start, pressed the pace, challenged between horses on the turn, dropped back and gave way. QUIEN ES was never far back, put in an even effort and failed to menace. BOISTEROUSLY IRISH bumped and was squeezed at the start, raced in the back and was outrun. THIRSTY JUNIOR bobbled, bumped and was squeezed at the start, trailed the field and was not urged in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Sigalert
ENTRY.OWNER: Green Greg MCM Stables LLC Yarbar R Dwain and Kuykendall Lane
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, responded to duel, yielded late, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Majorwayhome
ENTRY.OWNER: Holland, Roger D. and Holland, Melissa
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, bid between into stretch, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Quien Es
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, even effort, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Shane Zain
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, challenged between horses turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Thirsty Junior
ENTRY.OWNER: Alvarado Alfred and Valdez-Cabral Jr Martin M
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, bumped, squeezed start, trailed, not urged stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Boisterously Irish
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, squeezed start, no factor, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Cowboy Toby
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bumped, rallied 4wide turn, dueled, clear late
